about_the_game:
Take on the role of a fleet commander and lead your fleet to victory! Compete against other players' fleets over several rounds and gain fame and prestige throughout the galaxy.
Each round you will receive more credits to purchase the best ships or improvements for your strategy from the shop's random assortment. Create a powerful fleet not only by selecting the right spaceships, but above all by arranging them. Because each spaceship has its own advantages and disadvantages and can influence others in the vicinity. Optimize your fleet by merging spaceships to create new variants with stronger and combined effects.

Characteristics
  • Player versus player: Compete against the fleets of other players with the same rank and rise in rank yourself through your victories.
  • One fleet per game: A game starts with a small budget to buy the first ships. Expand the fleet after each battle with new credits and try to hold out as long as possible!
  • Store Phase without time pressure: Optimize your fleet for as long as you want and decide for yourself when to send it into battle.
  • Auto Battler: Fully automated combat with dynamically adjustable speed.
  • Countless different spaceships that differ in their stats, appearance and mechanics and are divided into different tiers.
  • Numerous spaceship upgrades: Increase base stats or add completely new traits.
  • Fusions: A variety of recipes to combine spaceships so that they fuse into a more powerful version, which can then even have entirely new mechanics.
  • Combat Tactics: Choose what kind of targets you want your starships to primarily attack and protect your important spaceships by hiding them behind others with stronger defenses.
  • Area effects: Position or rotate spaceships spatially so that they benefit from area effects from other spaceships. Find constellations to allow as many spaceships as possible to benefit from area effects.
  • Synergies: Find spaceships that support each other as well as possible through their mechanics and thus gain advantages over others.

Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 (SP1+), Windows 10 and Windows 11; x64 only
  • Processor: x64
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 750 MB available space

  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Spaceship Tactics is a sci-fi strategy autobattler. Build a mighty fleet, improve spaceships with powerful upgrades and find ways to fuse spaceships together. Decide battles by cleverly arranging your fleet!
